hero.headline: Zeta English Academy

mission.title: Empowering Versatile Learners
mission.description: Learning should be fun and inspiring. Zeta English Academy helps students build a strong foundation for future success with engaging lessons, supportive coaching, and space to share their ideas.

pillars.title: Versatile
pillars.description: We develop adaptable, curious learners who are ready for academic and life challenges.

pillars.title: Instrumental
pillars.description: We teach real-world communication, critical thinking, and confident self-expression.

pillars.title: Strategic
pillars.description: We guide each student with personalized planning, thoughtful feedback, and clear structure.

programLevels.title: Our Program
programLevels.intro: Zeta's core classes blend reading, grammar, and discussion so learners grow in comprehension, accuracy, and confident expression.

levels.name: LAB - Guided Reading for Fluency
levels.summary: Build confidence through leveled books, one-on-one coaching, and the joy of every story.

levels.name: Grammar - Write Clearly, Speak Powerfully
levels.summary: Interactive grammar workshops that build strong sentences, smart vocabulary, and fluent writing.

levels.name: Discussion - Speak Boldly, Think Deeply
levels.summary: Literature, debate, and projects come together to grow confident, critical English thinkers.
